title: A City Underwater
author: Brianna Gamble
body:
Charleston,
A city,
My city,
Below sea level.

Climate change,
A problem,
An epidemic,
With no solution in sight.

Charleston,
A city,
My city,
Drowning.

Tides lowering,
Sea levels rising,
Water everywhere,
What are we gonna do?

Charleston,
A city,
My city,
Underwater soon.
